1507430.name: Mayhem Fortress
1507430.description:
Some parts of the earth became uninhabitable by meteorite storms and the popularity of colonization forced people to leave their homes. When people left the earth, it wasn't long before they realized that many precious resources were remained behind.

Now you must lead your mech and build up your base, dominance over the harsh planet with the purpose of building up a spaceship that will allow travel back to your colony... You are alone in this mayhem. Can you survive?

You will need many resources to accomplish your goals and at the same time earth is not the same planet your race remained before... The planet is filled with valuable natural resources just waiting to be utilized. Build up your defenses, construct walls, traps and sentry towers and most importantly a landing pad for building an escape rocket.

Each gameplay in the game is randomized, offering replayability. And each construction has a meaning and features for player to develop new Equipment, Consumables, or Guns to load onto your mech.

Add functional and decorative parts to the exterior of your vehicle, you can change your mech upper or down body elements or you can make some modifications for your guns e.g. mini gun which capable of piercing enemy armor or rocket launcher, laser rifle or flame thrower...
